title: I don't cry OP until I've played a few games with a champion
body:
{{champion:105}} 2bursty
{{champion:92}} Everything
{{champion:421}}(On release) .. Haven't seen a Rek in forever, tho. Boring as fuck since you can't do what release Rek did imo
{{champion:23}} Get camped by the enemy jg, still randomly win lane and push to inhib
